title: Pacific Lottery Corporation Font Identity please!
content:
Help! Any idea what this small font is please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PLC_6018.gif)
author: andi emery

comments.content: Would you say Garamond?? (the amateur type detective ventures...)
Hi Andi. I'd say Adobe Garamond with a little squooshing (and spacing) would work.
